issue.title: [CF 861] Conditional Sliders Show Improper Values
issue.body:
http://i.imgur.com/ciJdOTk.jpg

This happens on most any slider. Anything with alphabetical options will have numerical, super-long decimal points, and you must drop the slider in order to see what you're actually on.

Also it's fairly annoying on numerical-only sliders, for example 'Absolute Primary Resource' where the slider is 0 - 20,000. As you can imagine, trying to specify something like 95 as your absolute is a fairly awful experience.


> Posted by CurseForge user Freeebo | Imported from CurseForge issue #861 | Raw
